description:
The Mud Whale`s magic users begin training to use their skills in combat as part of Suou`s defense plan, but not everyone is happy with his decision.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Ashita, Hito o Koroshite Shimau Kamoshirenai
Jutro być może będą musieli odebrać komuś życie
Tomorrow, I Might End Up Having to Kill Someone
明日, 人を殺してしまうかもしれない
